name: The Rivington Dining Table
description: The stylish Rivington dining table boasts contemporary edge and sophistication with its asymmetric pedestals offering a sculptural look in an iconic black-white pairing. The table top is finished in a pale satin sycamore silk top with three bases in high gloss sycamore black offering a modern contrast of colour and texture offset by antiqued brushed brass metalwork. Inspiration from the Rivington dining table comes from the two-tone tradition of contemporary artists, notably Mies Van der Rohe's Barcelona Pavilion. Combining two powerful shades in this boldly binary way expresses a confident minimalism and ultra-modern character. This table is available in a range of sizes to seat any number of people as well as bespoke finishes to suit each individual luxury dining room.
